intro: Ziziphus bullata, commonly known as the Indian date palm, is a deciduous shrub or small tree native to the Indian subcontinent. Ziziphus bullata thrives in arid and semi-arid climates, making it well adapted to harsh environmental conditions. Its botanical features make it an important species in both ecological and agricultural contexts.
